ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Higher level members in my guild say you can do that as long as one happens RIGHT after the other - but i would definitely test it first just to be
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----

> Hmm, does this mean my cleric friend (who picked up a gypsy
> lute when I wasn't there) could give the lute to the NPC, and
> I could give the NPC the carapace and ruby lambent, and I
> would get the breastplate?
>
> Do I really want to try this experiment considering it took me
> 3 days to get that damn carapace? Anyone know of a similar,
> easier quest we could test this theory on first?
>
> --
> John H. Kim

Higher level members in my guild say you can do that as long as one happens
RIGHT after the other - but i would definitely test it first just to be
certain!! No sense wasting all that time spent!! Good Luck!!!!

Brangwen Incantare
